articles.content: Just last month, Google ditched more than 50 apps from its Play Store over concerns the software could fill devices with annoying adware and leave Android users with a phone that's constantly being b… [+1810 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Google Meet upgrade just gave you five reasons to ditch WhatsApp and Zoom video calls - Express
articles.description: GOOGLE has shared details on plans for upcoming features in the works for its video call app, Google Meet, in order to tempt users to switch away from popular options like Facebook Messenger, Zoom, WhatsApp and more.

articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.title: PS Plus anniversary special download: Grab your FREE PlayStation Plus gift today on PS4 - Express
articles.description: PLAYSTATION Plus subscribers can pick up a brand new theme as part of Sony's ten-year PS Plus celebrations.
